p: A tablet press (Gamlen Tableting Ltd, UK) with a 6 mm diameter cylindrical flat-faced compacts was used in order to prepare the tablets. This tablet press was equipped with a 500 kg load cell 8CT6–500–022). 200 mg (±10 mg) of CBZD and 100 mg (±10 mg) were compacted at a compression speed of 60 mm/min. The tableting die was lubricated with magnesium stearate suspension prepared in acetone. Tablets were prepared in triplicate.
